lead_paragraph: Giovanna Petrucci, a recent high school graduate, performs on and high above a thin strap of nylon or polyester at Ipanema Beach.

headline.print_headline: Leap for Gold? Not Her Kind of Routine
headline.main: This Rio Phenom Would Be a Lock for a Gold. If There Were One for Slacklining.

snippet: Giovanna Petrucci, a recent high school graduate, performs on and high above a thin strap of nylon or polyester at Ipanema Beach....
abstract: Profile of Giovanna Petrucci, world champion slackliner from Rio de Janeiro whose acrobatics rival those of gymnasts and divers competing at 2016 Olympics.
